title: How to Beat Night 1 of Five Nights at Freddy's

steps.title: Wait.
steps.content: Wait. You will start out in your office, and the phone will ring. Listen to the Phone Guy (the former night guard) for information on how to play.

steps.title: Check the monitor.
steps.content: Check the monitor. On Night 1, the animatronics won't be very active, but you need to see if they form a pattern anyway. Foxy will very rarely move on Night 1 if you don't check the cameras at all, and Freddy will definitely not move. Your biggest threat is Bonnie.

steps.title: Be on the lookout.
steps.content: Be on the lookout. You'll want to keep an eye out for Bonnie and Chica, who begin to move at around 2-3am. Bonnie appears travels along left side of the map. Chica tends to stay to the right.

steps.title: Watch them.
steps.content: Watch them. Don't worry if they start to get close. If one appears outside a hallway, stay wary, but don't shut the door just yet.

steps.title: Check the lights periodically.
steps.content: Check the lights periodically. You will see if they are outside your office. If they are, shut the door and monitor the other side. Check every now and then to see if they leave. If they do, open the door.

steps.title: Try to keep both doors open as much as possible.
steps.content: Try to keep both doors open as much as possible. The doors drain your battery. Never shut both doors unless it's an emergency (i.e. animatronics outside both doors).
